object.property: Temporary breakpoints will be automatically deleted after the first time they have been hit.
This is the port on which the DBGP client listens. The default value is 9000.
The number of bytes that will be returns for a string while fetching variable contents.
The maximum number of children to be returned in a single request for variable warnings.
The number of levels deep that will be returned for variable contents.
Causes the PHP script to generate a breakpoint whenever a Notice, Warning or Error has been reached.

property.comments: TRANSLATORS: Replace this string with your names, one name per line.
property.name: translator_credits
